description.en: Learn how to use 'as many as' for comparisons with countable plural nouns.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'as many as' para comparaciones con sustantivos contables en plural.

prompt.es: No tengo tantos hijos como Paco.

exercises.solution: I don't have as many children as Paco.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: No hablo tantos idiomas como Silvia.

exercises.solution: I don't speak as many languages as Silvia.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Tengo tantos problemas como Paula.

exercises.solution: I have as many problems as Paula.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Te puedo dar todas las clases que necesites.

exercises.solution: I can give you as many classes as you need.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: En mi empresa hay tantas mujeres como hombres.

exercises.solution: In my company, there are as many women as men.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: He ido al doble de países que mi primo.

exercises.solution: I have been to twice as many countries as my cousin.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Londres tiene el doble de habitantes que Madrid.

exercises.solution: London has twice as many inhabitants as Madrid.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: He comprado el doble de libros este año que el año pasado.

exercises.solution: I've bought twice as many books this year as last year.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: En Inglaterra hay tres veces más no fumadores que fumadores.

exercises.solution: In England, there are three times as many non-smokers as smokers.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Ella tiene tantos como yo.

exercises.solution: She has as many as I do.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: No tengo tantos amigos como mi hermana.

exercises.solution: I don't have as many friends as my sister.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Ella no lee tantas novelas como yo.

exercises.solution: She doesn't read as many novels as I do.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: No veo tantas películas como antes.

exercises.solution: I don't watch as many films as I used to.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Él no tiene tantas responsabilidades como su jefe.

exercises.solution: He doesn't have as many responsibilities as his boss.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: No recibo tantos emails como mi colega.

exercises.solution: I don't receive as many emails as my colleague.

tip.en: Use 'as many as' with countable plural nouns: as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as many as' con sustantivos contables en plural: as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Mi ciudad tiene el triple de restaurantes que la tuya.

exercises.solution: My city has three times as many restaurants as yours.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Tengo el doble de plantas que mi vecina.

exercises.solution: I have twice as many plants as my neighbour.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Ella conoce cinco veces más personas que yo.

exercises.solution: She knows five times as many people as I do.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Esta universidad tiene el doble de estudiantes que la anterior.

exercises.solution: This university has twice as many students as the previous one.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.

prompt.es: Él tiene cuatro veces más coches que su hermano.

exercises.solution: He has four times as many cars as his brother.

tip.en: For multiples with countable nouns: number + times + as many + plural noun + as.
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos contables: número + times + as many + sustantivo plural + as.
